ComicInfo.Title: A Message from President George; Further Adventures; My Cosmic Connection with Rip Off Press; Reality for Da' Mice; Y'say It's Yer Birthday! 'Smy Birthday Tooo, Yeah!; Twisted Image; The Conclusive Argument; The Watermelon Baby Acid Trip; Comics Before 1969; 1969; Rip Off Press in the Age of Movie Money; Another Typical Day at the Rip Off Press; Night Shift!; Hey Kidskis, What Time Is It..??; Rip Off Press The Golden Era
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-20 01:24:24. [CVDB176052] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-12 20:51:28. [Issue ID 358733]
